actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.
Senate vitiated its passage and indefinitely postponed (H.J.Res. 749 passed in lieu).

official_title: A joint resolution extending the filing date of the 1976 Joint Economic Committee Report. Considered and passed; subsequently, passage vitiated and joint resolution indefinitely postponed.

summary.text: Directs the President to transmit the 1976 Economic Report to the Congress not later than January 26, 1976. Requires the Joint Economic Committee to file its report on the President's 1976 Economic Report with the Senate and the House not later than March 19, 1976.

titles.title: A joint resolution extending the filing date of the 1976 Joint Economic Committee Report. Considered and passed; subsequently, passage vitiated and joint resolution indefinitely postponed.
